SELECT student_id from student WHERE delete_status = 'N'
and student_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
GROUP BY student_code ASC

SELECT student_id from student WHERE delete_status = 'Y'
and student_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
GROUP BY student_code ASC

SELECT s.student_code AS studentCode, s.student_name AS studentName, s.student_sex AS studentSex, f.faculty_name AS facultyName, m.major_name AS majorName, c.class_name AS className, g.group_name AS groupName, s.student_tel AS studentTel, s.student_qq AS studentQq, s.student_email AS studentEmail FROM major m, faculty f,classes c,Student s ,groups g WHERE m.faculty_id = f.faculty_id AND m.major_id = c.major_id AND s.class_id = c.class_id AND s.group_id = g.group_id

SELECT s.student_id as studentId, s.student_code as studentCode, s.student_name as studentName, s.student_sex as studentSex, s.student_tel as studentTel, s.student_qq as studentQQ, s.student_email as studentEmail, s.student_picture_url as studentPictureUrl, s.class_id as classId, s.group_id as groupId, g.group_name as groupName, s.delete_status as deleteStatus, c.class_name as className, c.major_id as majorId, m.major_name as majorName, m.faculty_id as facultyId, f.faculty_name as facultyName, u.user_password as password FROM student s,groups g,classes c,major m,faculty f,user_login u WHERE s.student_id = #{id} AND s.class_id = c.class_id AND m.major_id = c.major_id AND f.faculty_id = m.faculty_id AND g.group_id = s.group_id AND s.student_id = u.user_id
